alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 21 at 5:22PM MDT until October 23 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM SATURDAY TO 6 PM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches at lower elevations, and up to 8 inches in the Bears Paw Mountains. * WHERE...Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine. * WHEN...From 6 PM Saturday to 6 PM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult.
info.instruction: Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine
